short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically identify inauthentic accounts and toxic Twitter trolls.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bot Sentinel is a free non-partisan platform developed to classify and track inauthentic accounts and toxic trolls. The platform uses machine learning and artificial intelligence to classify Twitter accounts, and then adds the accounts to a publicly available database that anyone can browse.
